page.title: 12Employment in Cowlinge
page.content: There are no industries in the village, hence all those of working age have to seek employment outside the area. They range from proffessional people to artisans. Agricultural workers, however are employed on the seceral farms which surround Cowlinge. Unemployment is very low. There are two small businesses, an all-purpose shop with petrol pump run byone man, and a good building and painting trade. There is some business transacted at the post office, and one public house is sufficient for all needs.
